廋字的基本解释

廋
sōu
隐藏，藏匿：廋辞（隐语，谜语，亦称“廋语”）。
古同“搜”，索求。

廋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sōu］
［《廣韻》所鳩切，平尤，生。］
亦作“廀1”。
(1)藏匿，隐藏。
(2)隐语。
(3)指廋人。
(4)弯曲处。
(5)通“搜”。参见“廋索”、“廋疏”。

廋字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【广字部】　廋； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页349第14
【廣韻】所鳩切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】疎鳩切，?音搜。【揚子·方言】廋，隱也。【註】謂隱匿也。【論語】人焉廋哉。　又【玉篇】隈也。　又求也，索也。【集韻】索室曰廋。【前漢·趙廣漢傳】廋索私屠沽。　又廋人，官名。【周禮·夏官】廋人掌十有二閑之政敎。　又【集韻】蘇后切，音叟。隱也。【晉語】有秦客廋辭於朝。【註】廋，隱也，謂以隱伏譎詭之言問於朝也。

廋字的起名意思

暂无。

Ling
Basic explanation of words
Ling
sōu
Hiding, hiding: lingering words (hidden words, riddles, also known as "lingy words").
Gu Tong "searched" and asked for it.
Ling
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [sōu]
["Guangyun" was cut, Pingyou, and born. ]
Also known as "廀1".
(1) Hiding, hiding.
(2) Hidden language.
(3) Refers to the Ling people.
(4) Bend.
(5) Link "Search". See "Lin Suo", "Lin Shu".
Ling
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji 2] [Guang Zi Department] 　廋; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: page 349-14
[Guang Yun] All Dove Cuts [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Nine Dove Cuts,? Sound Search. [Yangtze Dialect] Ling, hidden. [Note] It is also called concealment. [The Analects of Confucius] People are awkward.　[Jade Chapter] Kumaya.　 Ask again, ask for it. [Jiyun] Suo Shi said 廋. [Previous Han·Zhao Guanghan Biography] Ling Suo Si Tu Gu.　Another person, official name. 【Zhou Li·Xiaguan】Ling people hold ten and two leisurely politics.　[Jiyun] Su Hou cut, sound old. Hidden also. [Jin dialect] Qin Keyu resigned from the dynasty. 【Note】Xin, concealed, that is to ask Yuchao with concealed and sly words.

sōu
I гл.
1) скрываться, укрываться, прятаться
人焉廋哉 куда (как) скрыться от тебя человеку? (некуда скрыться)
2) искать, доискиваться, расследовать
II сущ.
